dcterms:description: The Lorenz-96 model is extensively used in climate science for modeling and prediction purposes, generating time series measurements for Granger causal inference.
dcterms:title: Lorenz-96

dcterms:creator: A. Bolstad
B. D. Van Veen

dcterms:description: The VAR dataset is generated according to a 3rd order linear VAR model, simulating time series measurements for Granger causal inference.
dcterms:title: VAR

dcterms:description: The Sim-3 dataset consists of simulated BOLD time series measurements for estimating brain connectivity and detecting Granger causal relationships.
dcterms:title: Sim-3

dcterms:creator: Daniel Marbach
Thomas Schaffter
Claudio Mattiussi
Dario Floreano
dcterms:description: The DREAM-3 dataset consists of in silico gene expression levels for estimating gene regulatory networks from time series measurements.
dcterms:title: DREAM-3
